column3: 2015) send sympathy gifts jasmine dawn mc. canna
column5: nd passed away at her home on tuesday
column7: 2015. funeral services for jasmine will be held on tuesday
column9: 2015 at 1:00 p. m. at the gilbertson funeral home
column10: devils lake. visitation will be held on monday at the funeral home from 4:00 p. m. until 6:00 p. m. and will continue on tuesday from 10:00 a. m. until time of service. jasmine dawn
column11: daughter of michael and maria (solga) mc. canna was born on june 22
column13: nd. she would make devils lake her home for her short lifetime. jasmine attended minnie h elementary school
column14: and graduated from devils lake high school with the class of 1995. while in school she played the violin with the orchestra. jasmine started working at a very young age
column15: working for her grandmother at dels drive in. she later worked as a bartender at the bottle shop and thirstys. she courageously fought several health problems and tried to live life to the fullest. jasmine was a number one
column17: huge fan of fighting sioux hockey and she loved sharing that pastime with her dear family and friends. our precious jasmine is gone
column18: but will never be forgotten. jasmine is survived by her dad
column19: micky mc. canna; brother jay mc. canna; niece reygan mc. canna; grandmother mildred solga all of devils lake and several aunts
column20: uncles and cousins and her loyal animal companions chloe
column21: nibs and dumbo. she was preceded in death by her mother
column22: maria; grandparents jay and del mc. canna and vincent solga. print back express your condolences contact us get mobile version privacy terms of use 2004 - 2015 gilbertson funeral home funeral home website by batesville
